translations.We want to keep offering our push notifi: We want to keep offering our push notification service for free, but large number of users overload our infrastructure. For this reason we have to rate-limit the use of push notifications. If you need this feature, consider using Nextcloud Enterprise.
translations.The device does not seem to be supported: The device does not seem to be supported
translations.An unexpected error occurred, ask your a: An unexpected error occurred, ask your administration to check the logs.
_You have a new notification for %s_::_Y: You have a new notification for %s
translations.You can change the frequency of these em: You can change the frequency of these emails or disable them in the settings.
You can change the frequency of these emails or disable them in the settings: %s
translations.Nextcloud GmbH sponsors a free push noti: Nextcloud GmbH sponsors a free push notification gateway for private users. To ensure good service, the gateway limits the number of push notifications per server and the limit was reached for this server. For enterprise users, a more scalable gateway is available.
translations.This app provides a backend and frontend: This app provides a backend and frontend for the notification API available in Nextcloud.

This app provides a backend and frontend for the notification API available in Nextcloud.
		The API is used by other apps to notify users in the web UI and sync clients about various things. Some examples are:

translations.Requesting browser permissions to show n: Requesting browser permissions to show notifications
translations.Nextcloud GmbH sponsors a free push noti: Nextcloud GmbH sponsors a free push notification gateway for private users. To ensure good service, the gateway limits the number of push notifications per server. For enterprise users, a more scalable gateway is available. Contact Nextcloud GmbH for more information.
